ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantulas sees as Killfest nad his men retreat. This isnt a good sign...that meant that Lino and his minions had beaten them. Black Aracnia, Quickstrike, I

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Tarantulas sees as Killfest nad his men retreat. This isnt a good 
sign...that meant that Lino and his minions had beaten them.
       "Black Aracnia, Quickstrike, I think that our cover is blown. Without 
the aid of the battle distraction we'd be shot dead. Quickly, get back to the 
ship and lets depart."
       The three Predacons boarded there ship, and took off towrds Earth. The 
ship shook a litte, but stablized.

       Ominous watched them flee in disgust. Why even bother coming all the 
way up here if they werent even going to try and win. He turned to Putnam. 
"Send 4 Energon missles to the Ark. Lock on to the engin room. Tell Quasar to 
get ready."
       Putnam placed in the order, and 4 Energon missles departed from the 
vessle, leaving a blue particle streak behinde them.

       Waspinator witnessed the balst. He buzzed over to see the reamins of 
Megatron, Rampage, and Marine. The later two were mostly together so he 
picked them up and flew back to the Ice Cave to put what little remained of 
them back together. 
       Megatrons body lay desimated. Nothing remained but a pile of purple 
transmetal ash. So sad to have such a good character be killed by such a 
cheap and lame mode.

--part1_91.6c2e709.27b7fdfa_boundary
